participant_1.background:
I work as a stay at home mom, which allows me to spend lots of time with my kids.
My clumsiness often causes me to trip over my own feet, but I always try to laugh it off.
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.
I once saw a massive elephant while on a safari in Africa.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

participant_2.background:
My favorite place to eat is at home, where I can enjoy my lasagna and not have to worry about the weather.
my dog introduced me to my first and second wives.
i m almost finished with my degree.
i was born in baton rouge.
i am a doctor.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Hey, I am doing well. How are you doing today?
I am doing good as well. Thanks for asking. What are you up to?
I am just finishing up with my work. What do you do for a living?
I am a stay at home mom. I love spending time with my kids.
That's great! I am almost finished with my degree to become a doctor.
Oh that's amazing! I bet you will be a great doctor.
Thanks! I hope so. I am excited to get started.
Where are you from?
I am from Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
Oh that's cool. I have always wanted to visit Louisiana.
You should! It is a beautiful state.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to cook, play video games, and spend time with my dogs.
Those are great hobbies! I love to cook too. I am a bit clumsy, but I always try to laugh it off.
Clumsiness can be funny sometimes. I am glad you can laugh about it.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite foods to cook?
I love to cook lasagna. My dog actually introduced me to lasagna.
That's funny. I have never met a dog that didn't like lasagna.
Yeah, he is a special dog.
I can imagine!
It was great talking to you. I have to go now, but I hope to talk to you again soon.
It was great talking to you too! Have a nice day.
You too
